Content: Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa visited Kataragama and engaged in religious observances after receiving blessings of the Maha Sangha. The Prime Minister met the Chief Sanghanayake of the Ruhuna Magampattuwa and chief incumbent of the Kirivehera Vihare the Ven. Kobawaka Dhamminda Thera and received his blessings. Thereafter he joined in religious observances held near the Kirivehera. The Prime Minister also participated in the Pooja at the Mahasen Devale. After paying obeisance to the Ashtapala Bodhi near the Kataragama Maha Devale Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa joined in religious observances at the Ghana Devale in Kataragama. Thereafter the Prime Minister arrived at the Abinawarama Vihare in Kataragama. Mahinda Rajapaksa called on the Ruhuna Magampattuwe Chief Adhikarana Sanghanayake the Ven. Kapugama Saranatissa thera and received his blessings. He also attended religious observances there. The Prime Minister participated in the Thewawas there and participated in the Pooja.
